question: I have a friend who tends to stutter sometimes. He tends to stammer on some words. I was wondering if there are any Quranic ayaat to recite that can help him decrease his stuttering.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
We advise the person recite verses 25,26,27 of Surah Ta Ha in the 16th juz
of the Quran.

And Allah Ta'ala knows best

Mufti E. Desai
